norheatwave.long_name: Difference in number of Norwegian heatwave events between reference and future periods
norheatwave.description: DIfference in norwegian heat wave events. Change in the number of events with maximum temperature above or equal to 27 degrees (tasmax>=27°C) five days in a row between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100.
norheatwave.norwegian_description: Differanse i norske hetebølgehendelser. Endring i antall hendelser med maksimumstemperatur over eller like 27 grader (tasmax>=27°C) fem dager på rad mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100.
